title: St. Ives Facial Moisturizer, Timeless Skin Collagen Elastin, 10oz
Murad Skin Perfecting Lotion, 3: Hydrate/Protect, 1.7 fl oz (50 ml)
description: Hydrates and retexturizes skin by controlling oil and shine and keeping pores clear and minimized. Balances oily and dry zones to improve texture and reveal healthy-looking skin. Light, oil-free hydrator refines and softens skin texture. Queen of Meadow Extract tightens pores and reduces oil production. Retinol restores youthfulness to skin. Soy Flour firms and protects elasticity. As a leader in research and development, Murad has long been at the forefront of skincare science. Applying insights from my skin research center, dermatology practice and the Murad Medical Spa, we continue this tradition. Ours is an inclusive health philosophy, based on the water principle, a comprehensive inside and out approach to optimal skin health and total wellness. Healthy skin is beautiful skin. My commitment is to provide you with the most advanced formulations and pharmaceutical grade ingredients to restore and strengthen your skin, allowing your healthy radiance to shine through. Scientifically proven. Dermatologist developed and tested. Murad does not test on animals. Made in the USA.

title: Proactiv Solution Revitalizing Toner 4 oz.
description:
Step two of our Proactiv Solution daily essentials, this refreshing, alcohol-free toner helps balance skin tone and remove dead skin cells to reveal the vital, radiant skin beneath. 
Size: 4 oz.

Benefits: 
Our special formulation balances skin's natural acids

Witch hazel refines and purifies pores

Aloe and chamomile soothe and soften

Allantoin stimulates the grown of healthy tissue

Removes excess surface oil without drying
